definition: Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)

sentences.english: Mongolia and Russia, based on the use of Cyrillic alphabet text.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古和俄罗斯境内的使用斯拉夫字母为基础的文字。

sentences.english: Nothing really. I'm in Slavic studies.
sentences.chinese: 随便说说，我是学斯拉夫语的。

sentences.english: Slavonic Dance No. 11 for piano, 4 hands in F major.
sentences.chinese: 大调为钢琴四手联弹而作的第11斯拉夫舞曲。

sentences.english: I was born on the village of Vivcani near Ohrid in Yugoslavian Macedonia.
sentences.chinese: 我出生在南斯拉夫的马其顿的奥赫里德乡村。

sentences.english: Slavonic Dance No. 15 for piano, 4 hands in C major.
sentences.chinese: 大调为钢琴四手联弹而作的第15斯拉夫舞曲。

sentences.english: Czech, a member of the Slavic languages.
sentences.chinese: 捷克语，是斯拉夫语言的一种。

sentences.english: The war years in Yugoslavia were pure hell,” Simic told USINFO in an interview August 9.
sentences.chinese: 南斯拉夫的战争年代全然一场恶梦。

sentences.english: The server is having trouble with Cyrillic input.
sentences.chinese: 服务器在接受斯拉夫语字母的输入时有困难。

sentences.english: A city of northwest-central Yugoslavia northwest of Sarajevo.
sentences.chinese: 南斯拉夫中部偏西北一城市，位于萨拉热窝西北。

sentences.english: Former Yugoslavia president Slobodan Milosevic is trialed for war crimes.
sentences.chinese: 前南斯拉夫总统米洛舍维奇被判战争罪。

sentences.english: What were you running after, pretty Slav lass?
sentences.chinese: 美丽的斯拉夫姑娘你又去追赶什么？

sentences.english: Vladimir Radmanovic was born into civil war in the former Yugoslavia.
sentences.chinese: 拉马出生在南斯拉夫战火纷飞的年代。

sentences.english: The official language is Slovenian, which is a member of the South Slavic language group.
sentences.chinese: 官方语言是斯洛文尼亚语，属于南斯拉夫语言的一支。

sentences.english: Once the vastly more experienced Yugoslavia stopped laughing, they rattled in four themselves to progress to the next round.
sentences.chinese: 经验丰富的南斯拉夫队趁机又连进四球，挺进下一轮。

sentences.english: The euro and the Yugoslav dinar are both accepted currencies in Kosovo.
sentences.chinese: 欧元以及南斯拉夫第纳尔共为科索沃的官方货币。

sentences.english: The Republic was one of the poorer areas of the former Yugoslavia.
sentences.chinese: 马其顿共和国是前南斯拉夫较贫穷的区域之一。
